author: cms-sw
body:
- Drop all py2-* packages and auto generate them when needed
  - new py2 packages should be added in pi/requirements.txt file
- Drop all cmssw data-* packages and auto generate them when needed
  - new data packages should be added in data/data-build-github-new.txt
  - Any updade to data packages should be done via data/data-build-github-new.txt along with any cleanup
- This needs pkgtools V00-32-XX ( https://github.com/cms-sw/pkgtools/commit/ea055de0aab670de91a6dad5c1eb6ca4b2542882 )

This PR should not re-build any package as generated specs should have the same contents as the existing .spec files.
title: drop data-* and py2-* files and auto generate them
